3.res: Here are the estimated wait times in Edmonton. Fort Saskatchewan Community Hospital, 30 minutes. Stollery Children's Hospital, 33 minutes. WestView Health Centre, 1 hour 15 minutes. Leduc Community Hospital, 1 hour 22 minutes. University of Hospital, 1 hour 49 minutes. Strathcona Community Hospital , 1 hour 52 minutes. Grey Nuns Community Hospital, 2 hours 13 minutes. Sturgeon Community Hospital, 4 hours 19 minutes. Royal Alexandra Hospital, 4 hours 54 minutes. Northeast Community Health Centre, 5 hours 30 minutes. Misercordia Community Hospital, 5 hours 30 minutes. For more information on emergency wait times and options for care, visit, AHS -dot- CA slash wait-times or call Health Link at 811.
